ingredients.ingredient: 8 ½ ounces Brie cheese, thinly sliced
1 (14 ounce) package purchased fully baked pizza crust (such as Boboli®)

cookingTips: Toast the almonds lightly in a dry skillet before adding for better flavor and crunch
Add Brie just in the last few minutes of baking so it melts but doesn't brown too much
Let the pizza rest 2-3 minutes before slicing to allow cheese to set slightly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a sophisticated, gourmet pizza. Would you like to add any vegetables or fresh herbs?
